item.title: Rubik's Cube 3D Game in Vala/Clutter
item.description: Hello, I’ve written a simple program for playing with a Rubik’s Cube using Vala and Clutter. It features: high simplicity in rotating cube slices and rotating the cube itself in a very natural manner shuffle the cube autosave the game Download and more usage information at the homepage… have fun :)
